snippet: Yellowstone National Park proposed to kill about 1,000 wild bison, mostly calves and females, this winter as officials seek to reduce the animals’ annual migration into Montana.
abstract: Yellowstone National Park officials are seeking to kill 1,000 wild bison in attempt to keep animals from migrating into rest of Montana and spreading disease brucellosis to livestock.
lead_paragraph: Yellowstone National Park proposed to kill about 1,000 wild bison, mostly calves and females, this winter as officials seek to reduce the animals’ annual migration into Montana.

headline.main: Montana: Yellowstone Park Wants 1,000 Wild Bison Killed in Winter
headline.print_headline: Montana: Yellowstone Park Wants 1,000 Wild Bison Killed in Winter
